TopicTitle: Resize menus, but keep the navball small?

Articles.Content:
I have resized the menus to 150% due to tiny scrollers being hard to operate.


Now the menus looks nearly perfect (except for "Load" menu, still tiny scrollers). But the navball became something monstrous now.

 

It is possibly to resize menus only but still keep the navball of a reasonable size?

The latest version of the game has a UI controller (accessed from in-game, not on the main menu) that adjusts the size of individual UI elements.

Edited May 2, 2016 by MaxxQ

Uh, nice.

Thank you.
